description: This file is a shell script that provides utility functions for process management, network interface analysis, and DNS query checks, likely used within a larger system for network device management or testing.

methods.name: checkProcess
methods.description: Checks if a process with a given name is running by filtering with grep.

methods.name: killProcess
methods.description: Kills the process with the specified name by obtaining its PID.

methods.name: getCMMACAddress
methods.description: Retrieves the MAC address of the device's erouter0 network interface.

methods.name: getQueryResult
methods.description: Performs a DNS query check and retrieves the result status.
